data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about being a volunteer.
data.answer: Being a volunteer is always an exciting and meaningful experience. I have volunteered in a few events and I think it is very important that people volunteer. This is because the core of volunteering is giving out hands. When I volunteered, I felt like helping those in need and helping them directly with me physically being onsite gave me a memorable experience. I think people can do different kinds of voluntary work depending on their own preferences. For example, I love studying history so I decided to volunteer in a history museum during the school holidays being a guide for school children. Therefore, everyone should try to volunteer regularly in areas that they are interested in.

options.content: Why is it important that people volunteer?
What kinds of things can people volunteer to do?
Have you ever been a volunteer?
